LanguageData.SurrogateHeart.label: surrogate heart
LanguageData.SurrogateHeart.description: Redundant item version for 1.1 RimWorld. A method was left to not break your workbench and allowing the recipe to exist for player self-debug purposes.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticHeart.label: surrogate heart
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticHeart.description: A more or less powerful pump to maintain the bloodstream. Patients feel exhausted from time to time.
LanguageData.SurrogateLung.label: surrogate lung
LanguageData.SurrogateLung.description: A rudimentary lung replacement. Makes a deep, clicking noise.
LanguageData.SurrogateStomach.label: surrogate stomach
LanguageData.SurrogateStomach.description: A rudimentary stomach replacement. Produces unpleasant smelling bowel gas.
LanguageData.SurrogateLiver.label: surrogate liver
LanguageData.SurrogateLiver.description: A rudimentary blood filter. Has problems with keeping the blood sugar level constant.
LanguageData.SurrogateKidney.label: surrogate kidney
LanguageData.SurrogateKidney.description: A rudimentary kidney replacement. One of its possible side effects is getting pale.
LanguageData.BrainStimulator.label: brain stimulator
LanguageData.BrainStimulator.description: A small device that does its best to stimulate the remaining areas of the brain. Recommended for severe brain damage only. Requires brain surgery research before installing.
